name: nrafunded
description: Let's take Congress back from the NRA.

scripts.css: postcss node_modules/basscss-margin/index.css -u postcss-custom-properties -o src/css/basscss-margin.css && postcss node_modules/basscss-padding/index.css -u postcss-custom-properties -o src/css/basscss-padding.css
scripts.deploy: npm run build && touch dist/.nojekyll && gh-pages -d dist
scripts.data: npm run scrape && npm run parse
scripts.render: npm run render:analysis && npm run render:body

author: Lachlan Campbell <lachlan.campbell@icloud.com>
